title: A Golden State Crisis? Finding Positions In LA
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to talk the drama surrounding Draymond Green’s altercation with Jordan Poole, if the team was right to call it a ‘crisis’ situation, how things are meshing together with the Lakers and talk ‘What Is Going On In’ Minnesota as we head into the season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Should We Be Concerned With Golden State? Lakers' Chemistry Updates
